landing.bio: I am a Software Development Engineer with a strong hold on data structures and algorithms. Currently I am working at via.com. I Always on lookout for opportunities to utilize my skills and achieve personal and professional growth while being resourceful, innovative and dynamic in my work that leads to a learning experience.

experience.aboutWork: I worked as a part of the Flight dev team, handling the Singapore division. Created Galileo api Searcher that will consists of all states for booking. Then Worked as a part of Hotel dev Team, handling all divisions including India and International (8 Countries). Integrated end to end flow of suppliers like Expedia, Cleartrip, tbo and Miki Api’s. Created various Via outbound hotels api’s for client booking. Created Hotel Analytics dashboard using Kafka.
Created hybrid attribute-based recommender system for product recommendation using genetic algorithm and multidimensional information model.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science & Engineering

interests.paragraphOne: Apart from being a software developer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors. I am passionate about photography and film making and aspire to start a YouTube channel of my own one day.
interests.paragraphTwo: When forced indoors, I follow a number of sci-fi and fantasy genre movies and television shows, and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the consumer tech field like new products and apps..

awards.awardDetail: Winner of Coding Arena Programming Competition 1.0
Certified Java from Tech raga Training and Development PVT.LTD
Certified Bigdata Hadoop from VMDD Technologies & Hackveda Appsec Labs
